short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate QR code for current page or any link to scan and open directly from mobile.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The QR Code Generator is a handy Chrome extension that simplifies the process of generating QR codes for web URLs. With just a few clicks, you can create QR codes for any URL you specify, making it convenient for sharing links or information with others.
